function.name: ttest
function.title: Student's t-Test
function.summary: One-sample and paired Student's t-Test on arrays of numbers

param.name: mu
param.description: The hypothesized true mean under the null hypothesis.

param.name: tails
param.description: Whether the alternative hypothesis is that the mean of x (or difference between x and y) is larger than mu (1, i.e. "one-sided greater than"), smaller than mu (-1, i.e. "one-sided less than") or equal to mu (0, i.e. "two-sided").

param.name: alpha
param.description: Number in the interval [0,1] giving the significance level of the hypothesis test.
